title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% completion rate achieved with proactive reminders, enhancing data quality.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate daily push notifications to maintain engagement throughout treatment.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸŸ¡ NOTABLE]**: Growing emphasis on PROs in regulatory guidelines for cancer trials.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may underrepresent severe cases, affecting generalizability.
